```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tseries)
library(forecast)

load("data/price_data.Rdata")

```


Subselect data
```{r}
df = pd$BTC;
df = df[2000:nrow(df),]
head(df)
```



Time series decomposition

```{r}
bts = ts(df$close,frequency=7*24)
z=decompose(bts);
plot(z)
```

Holt Winters

```{r}

df = pd$BTC;
df = df[2000:nrow(df)]
plot(df$time,df$close)

ts = ts(df$close,frequency=24)
m1 = HoltWinters(ts)
fc = forecast(m1,h=500)

```
